name: Bastion
description: Repair protocols and the ability to transform between stationary Assault, mobile Recon and devastating Tank configurations provide Bastion with a high probability of victory.

abilities.name: Configuration: Recon
abilities.description: In Recon mode, Bastion is fully mobile, outfitted with a submachine gun that fires steady bursts of bullets at medium range.

abilities.name: Configuration: Sentry
abilities.description: In Sentry mode, Bastion is a stationary powerhouse equipped with a gatling gun capable of unleashing a hail of bullets. The gun's aim can be "walked" across multiple targets dealing devastating damage at short to medium range.

abilities.name: Reconfigure
abilities.description: Bastion transforms between its two primary combat modes to adapt to changing battlefield conditions.

abilities.name: Self-Repair
abilities.description: Bastion restores its health; it cannot move or fire weapons while the repair process is in effect.

abilities.name: Configuration: Tank
abilities.description: In Tank mode, Bastion extends wheeled treads and a powerful long-range cannon. The cannon’s explosive shells demolish targets in a wide blast radius, but Bastion can only remain in this mode for a limited time.
